properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Provincetown MA to Chatham MA to Nantucket MA out 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 12 at 4:01PM EST until February 13 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Boston/Norton MA
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 10 to 15 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas
4 to 7 feet expected.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Provincetown MA to Chatham MA to
Nantucket MA out 20 nm.

* WHEN...From 7 AM to 7 PM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 7 PM EST THURSDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED
